name: 99RoomsSimulator
description:
Explore a vast sprawling maze within a maze, and see if you can find enough Doors to keep progressing. Expand your definition of Door until the very concept of categories seems meaningless.  Enjoy frustrating point and click gameplay where every pixel is a new nightmare of hunt-and-peck action.

Avoid glitches to prolong the game. 
Or seek them out, what am I, your parent?
